column1: Smoque BBQ////I went on a Sunday afternoon ready to wait. Lucky me
column2: I was ordering in just a couple of minutes! I got a half slab of baby back ribs
column5: and coleslaw. My boyfriend got the chopped brisket sandwich
column7: and coleslaw. My ribs were absolutely perfect! Smoky bark
column9: not too fatty. I dunked the pieces in the accompanying regular and spicy sauce.
